QuestData.Title: Ihgaluk Crag
QuestData.Description: Archmage Modera has taken over at Ihgaluk Crag, to the southeast, continuing her efforts to turn the Saurok against the Zandalari and mogu.$B$BGo to her, and help in any way that you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Archmage Modera outside of Ihgaluk Crag.
QuestData.RewardText: You have good timing. I am quite in need of your assistance.
